title: How the bacterial replicative helicase opens to start DNA replication process

title_detail.value: How the bacterial replicative helicase opens to start DNA replication process

summary: Researchers have identified the mechanism used by the helicase ring to thread around and separate entwined DNA strands in the replication process.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have identified the mechanism used by the helicase ring to thread around and separate entwined DNA strands in the replication process.
